title: Big Tech's Midterm Manipulation Exposed | Guests: Dr. Robert Epstein & Rep. Mayra Flores | 11/2/22
description:
President Biden falsely stated that his son died in Iraq again, and that’s not the only outright lie he’s said recently. Did the FBI tamper with the footage of the Jan. 6 pipe bombing by lowering the frame rate to an impossible level? Stu goes through the good, the bad, and the iffy latest poll numbers. Blaze podcast host Daniel Horowitz joins to debate whether Republicans will capitalize on an upcoming state legislative tsunami. Rep. Mayra Flores joins to discuss the possible red migration happening in the Hispanic community. Dr. Robert Epstein joins to reveal the mounting evidence showing Google’s attempt to influence the upcoming midterms. Senate candidate Blake Masters joins to lay out the issues at stake for Arizona voters and voters across the country. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
